metadata.feature_description: Provides multi-language support for all UI elements and messages in the PersonaBar.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Switch language to Spanish via URL

steps.expected: Page loads with Spanish locale URL structure
steps.actual: Page loaded successfully at /es-es/ URL, Spanish flag indicator active

steps.expected: Language parameter in URL properly recognized
steps.actual: URL changed to /es-es/ and page content loaded. Language flags updated to show Spanish as active.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify UI strings are localized for Spanish

steps.action: Access PersonaBar while on Spanish URL
steps.expected: PersonaBar UI elements should display in Spanish
steps.actual: All PersonaBar UI elements remained in English: 'Site Settings', 'Languages', 'CULTURE', 'ENABLED', 'System Default', etc.

steps.action: Check Dashboard panel in Spanish mode
steps.expected: Dashboard labels should be in Spanish
steps.actual: Dashboard displayed all English labels: 'Site Analytics', 'Insights', 'Top Fives', 'Not now', 'Connect'

steps.expected: Menu items should be localized to Spanish
steps.actual: All menu items in English: 'Site Settings', 'Security', 'Workflow', 'SEO', 'Community', 'Gamification', 'Connectors', etc.

issues: PersonaBar UI does not display in Spanish despite being on Spanish locale URL. Spanish resource files are missing (354 missing resource files identified by Resource File Verifier).

steps.action: Navigate to Languages settings and click 'Add New Language'
steps.expected: Language selection dropdown should include French
steps.actual: Language dropdown displayed with French (Francais) available in the list of available languages to add

issues: French language is not installed by default. Only English (United States) and Spanish (Espana) are enabled. French would need to be added before testing.

steps.expected: German should be available for testing
steps.actual: German is not installed. Only English and Spanish are configured on the site.

issues: German language is not installed by default. Site only has English (United States) and Spanish (Espana) enabled.

steps.action: Click 'Verify Language Resource Files' button in Languages settings
steps.expected: Resource File Verifier should display verification results
steps.actual: Resource File Verifier opened showing: English - 142 Malformed Resource Files; Spanish - 354 Missing Resource Files, 1 Malformed Resource File

steps.action: Expand Missing Resource Files for Spanish
steps.expected: List of missing resource files should be displayed
steps.actual: Full list of 354 missing Spanish resource files displayed, including PersonaBar.es-ES.resx, SiteSettings.es-ES.resx, and other critical UI resource files

steps.action: Verify System Default and Site Default language settings
steps.actual: System Default: English (United States), Site Default: English (United States). Both properly configured.

steps.action: Access Spanish URL and verify fallback behavior
steps.expected: When Spanish translations are missing, system should fall back to English
steps.actual: System correctly falls back to English for all UI elements when Spanish translations are missing. This is expected behavior given the 354 missing Spanish resource files.

observations: Spanish language is configured but 354 resource files are missing, preventing actual UI localization
142 English resource files are marked as malformed, though English UI still functions
The 'Users May Choose Interface Language' setting is Off, limiting language switching options
'Allow Content Localization' is Off, preventing content-level language management
Language parameter in URLs is enabled and functional (en-us, es-es paths work)
Browser Language Detection is enabled but doesn't affect PersonaBar UI
French and German languages are available to install but not pre-configured
Code suggests localization infrastructure exists (App_LocalResources paths referenced) but resource files are missing for non-English languages
